remarks: The preimage of any open set (in the complex topology) under a measurable function is measurable.  (See also ~ cncombf , which explains why ` A e. dom vol ` is too weak a condition for this theorem.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2014.)
statement:
mbfimaopn.1 $e |- J = ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) $.
mbfimaopn $p |- ( ( F e. MblFn /\ A e. J ) -> ( `' F " A ) e. dom vol ) $.
